com.epam.esm.repository.dao

Interface GiftCertificateDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GiftCertificateDaoImpl

    public interface GiftCertificateDao
    The GiftCertificateDao interface provides methods for creating, reading, updating and deleting gift certificates.
    Author:
    Yury Lapitski

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Searches for gift certificates with sorting

      • findByPartOfName

        List<com.epam.esm.entity.GiftCertificate> findByPartOfName(String name)
        Searches for gift certificate by name. It can be part of name
        Parameters:
        name - name (part of name) of the gift certificate to find
        Returns:
        founded list of gift certificate

      • findAllWithSort

        List<com.epam.esm.entity.GiftCertificate> findAllWithSort(String columnName,
                                                          String sortType)
        Searches for gift certificates with sorting
        Parameters:
        columnName - column name to sorting by
        sortType - sorting type. Can be ASC or DESC.
        Returns:
        founded list of gift certificate
